item.description:
You know you've been putting off working on that project that's been floating around in your head like a dropping leaf off an oak tree (or, for some of us, plummeting like an acorn), so why not join us for an exercise and brainstorming session to stop procrastinating!

Or, just come for fun, hilarity, and for those who are interested, a drink or two afterward.

As always, if you have any ideas for fun exercises or discussion topics, let me know!

-Kate
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be somewhere on the second floor, either the front or the back...look for the quill.
item.name: Writing Exercises and Brainstorming Meetup
